commentBody: I predict that Trump will do his best to turn the national Republican Convention into a multiple day infomercial for Trump, Trump's businesses, and Trump branding.  He will receive more celebrity endorsements than political endorsements, as is only fitting for a reality TV star turned amateur politician.  Paul Ryan says Trump wants to work with the Republican Party.  He's got it wrong.  Trump wants the Republican Party to work for him.  Just you wait and see.
